document_data.name: Violet Goldhammer
document_data.mainbody: '''Violet Goldhammer''' was a singer from [[Reithwin]], once a [[Sel√ªnite]] town in the [[Western Heartlands]], sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Violet perished sometime before the fall of Reithwin and it being consumed by the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]] before the {{YearlinkName|1374}}. She was buried in Reithwin's graveyard by the northeastern wall of the [[House of Healing]]. Her tombstone read: "Here rests Violet Goldhammer, beloved singer. May her voice live on in our memories." Violet's grave marker remained relatively undamaged and legible as of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
